issue.title: [Rust][Datafusion] Support joins on TimestampMillisecond columns
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11940](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11940). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Joining DataFrames on a TimestampMillisecond column gives error:

```

'called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: Internal("Unsupported data type in hasher")

arrow/rust/datafusion/src/physical_plan/hash_join.rs:252:30

'

```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11940?focusedCommentId=17332394) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-datafusion/issues/187
